page.title: 04Cider Production
page.content: In Much Marcle there is a large cider making factory called Westons where a lot of people from the village work. The factory was started in 1880 by Henry Weston and his family have made cider ever since then.Cider is made from cider apples that come from cider apples that come from the local orchards.Kingston black is the best cider apple for cider production.The factory starts to make cider in september and all the time you can watch the tractors and trailers taking the apples to Westons.To make the cider the apples are washed, chopped and crushed to get the juice out.The juice is fermented in huge vats to make cider.My father works at Westons delivering cider all over the country. He goes to places like London,Manchester, Southhampton and Exeter.Dad enjoys working at Westons.
